queries.description: Virtual inheritance should not be used as it may lead to unexpected behavior.
queries.name: Classes should not be inherited virtually

RULE-13-1-1.title: Classes should not be inherited virtually

queries.description: Appropriate use of specifiers on member functions more clearly indicate the intention of the function.
queries.name: User-declared member functions shall use the virtual, override and final specifiers appropriately

RULE-13-3-1.title: User-declared member functions shall use the virtual, override and final specifiers appropriately

queries.description: Mixing public and private data members in a class obfuscates the range of valid states allowable for that class.
queries.name: Non-static data members should be either all private or all public

RULE-14-1-1.title: Non-static data members should be either all private or all public

queries.description: Proper implementations of copy and move constructors and assignment operators ensure that resources are managed correctly.
queries.name: User-provided copy and move member functions of a class should have appropriate signatures

RULE-15-0-2.title: User-provided copy and move member functions of a class should have appropriate signatures

queries.description: Implicit conversions can lead to unexpected behavior that is preventable by declaring conversion operators and constructors as explicit.
queries.name: Conversion operators and constructors that are callable with a single argument shall be explicit

RULE-15-1-3.title: Conversion operators and constructors that are callable with a single argument shall be explicit

queries.description: Overloaded logical AND and logical OR operators change short-circuiting behavior and can lead to unexpected results.
queries.name: The logical AND and logical OR operators shall not be overloaded

RULE-16-5-1.title: The logical AND and logical OR operators shall not be overloaded

queries.description: Function resolution of operators overloaded as member functions is dependent on ordering and available conversions, which can lead to unexpected behavior.
queries.name: Symmetrical operators should only be implemented as non-member functions

RULE-16-6-1.title: Symmetrical operators should only be implemented as non-member functions
